H3.text: where did the anasazi indians live. Four Corners

A4.text: The name was first applied to ruins of the Mesa Verde by Richard Wetherill.

A5.text: The Ancestral Puebloans ... spanned the present-day Four Corners region of the United States, comprising southeastern Utah, northeastern Arizona, northwestern New Mexico, and southwestern Colorado.

A6.text: Chaco Culture National Historic Park Virtual Museum Exhibit, from National Park Service
